import{createApi,fetchBaseQuery}from'@reduxjs/toolkit/query/react';var baseURI='https://expense-tracker-pet-project.herokuapp.com/';export var apiSLice=createApi({baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:baseURI}),endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{getCategories:builder.query({// get to the baseURI/....
query:function query(){return'/api/categories';},providesTags:['categories']}),// get labels
getLabels:builder.query({query:function query(){return'/api/labels';},providesTags:['transaction']}),// add new transaction
addTransaction:builder.mutation({query:function query(initialTransaction){return{url:'/api/transaction',method:'POST',body:initialTransaction};},invalidatesTags:['transaction']}),// delete record
deleteTransaction:builder.mutation({query:function query(recordId){return{url:"/api/transaction/".concat(recordId),method:'DELETE',boyd:recordId};},invalidatesTags:['transaction']})};}});export default apiSLice;
